characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle, a Night Shroud can drop death spheres on an enemy unit it moves over during one of your Movement phases.  After the Night Shroud has moved, pick one enemy unit that it has passed over.  Then roll 3D6 for each VEHICLE or MONSTER in the unit, and roll a D6 for every other model in the unit, up to a maximum of 12D6.  For each roll of 3+, the target unit suffers a mortal wound.
